repositories.author: 1024-lab
repositories.name: smart-admin
repositories.description: SmartAdmin国内首个以「高质量代码」为核心，「简洁、高效、安全」快速开发平台；基于SpringBoot2/3 + Sa-Token + Mybatis-Plus 和 Vue3 + Vite5 + Ant Design Vue 4.x (同时支持JavaScript和TypeScript双版本)；满足国家三级等保要求、支持登录限制、接口数据国产加解密、高防SQL注入等一系列安全体系。

repositories.author: AutoMQ
repositories.name: automq
repositories.description: AutoMQ is a cloud-native alternative to Kafka by decoupling durability to cloud storage services like S3. 10x Cost-Effective. No Cross-AZ Traffic Cost. Autoscale in seconds. Single-digit ms latency. Multi-AZ Availability.
